attributes.additional_details: We do not think that David Cameron, Nick Clegg, any of the Conservative Party or Liberal Democrat Party are fit to serve this country, all they do is spread lies and make the unemployed and disabled suffer; as well as increasing tuition fees at university and making everybody else lose out by raising the VAT to a ridiculous amount of 20%. It seems like all the current Government wants to do is make the whole country suffer at the cost of reducing the deficit. Regardless whether or not it needs paying off is not really the fault of taxpayers and because of this we do not see why that schools, hospitals, and every other public sector department are being made to "pay the price" because David Cameron and Nick Clegg are useless. By signing this petition we call for the Labour party to take over with immediate effect and sort this mess out that the Con-Dem Government have made.
